availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Rebecca Nelson Martin in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on January 26, 1846. Father of Robert H. Martin, George Martin, Martha Martin, Lafayette Martin, David Martin, and Rascoe Martin. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Farmersville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 305A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Farmersville, p. 126-27.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644.
